article.title: Igris to Develop Moving Vehicle Interrogation System
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Igris LLC, Cordova, Tennessee, was awarded a $9,469,316 cost-plus-fixed-fee, firm-fixed-price, level-of-effort contract. The award will provide for the engineering services in support of the research and development of a Moving Vehicle Interrogation System. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Adelphi, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
